faqs.question: Does it require PS Plus?
faqs.answer: No, it's fully playable offline.

faqs.question: Is it a remake or remaster?
faqs.answer: It's a full remake with rebuilt visuals and gameplay.

faqs.question: Does it have multiplayer?
faqs.answer: No, it's a single-player campaign.

title: Resident Evil 3 (PS4 Edition)
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse in Raccoon City as Jill Valentine in this intense survival horror remake.
gameplayHours: Main Story - 6 hours, Main + Extra - 15 hours
about: Resident Evil 3 is a remake of the 1999 classic, featuring modernized gameplay and enhanced visuals.

faqs.question: Is this game PS4 compatible?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's playable on PS4.

faqs.question: Does it require PS Plus?
faqs.answer: No, it's fully playable offline.

faqs.question: Does it include multiplayer?
faqs.answer: Yes, it includes the Resident Evil Resistance multiplayer mode.

similarProducts.name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic (PS4 Edition)

title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (PS4 Edition)
description: Engage in high-octane FPS action with a thrilling campaign, multiplayer, and zombies mode.
gameplayHours: Main Story - 10 hours, Main + Extra - 50 hours
about: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is a PS4 FPS featuring a cinematic campaign, competitive multiplayer, and zombies mode.

faqs.question: Does it require PS Plus?
faqs.answer: Yes, for online multiplayer; campaign is playable offline.

faqs.question: Does it have a single-player campaign?
faqs.answer: Yes, it includes a full campaign mode.

faqs.question: Is zombies mode included?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features a cooperative zombies mode.

title: Ghost Recon Wildlands (PS4 Edition)
description: Lead a team of elite Special Forces operatives in this massive open-world tactical shooter set in Bolivia.
gameplayHours: Main Story - 30 hours, Completionist - 100+ hours
about: Ghost Recon Wildlands offers a massive military sandbox where you strategically dismantle a drug cartel.

faqs.question: Is the game world large?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features one of gaming's largest open worlds with 11 distinct biomes.

faqs.question: Can you play solo?
faqs.answer: Yes, with AI teammates (added in a post-launch update).

faqs.question: How many players for co-op?
faqs.answer: Supports up to 4-player online co-op.

title: Watch Dogs Legion (PS4 Edition)
description: Build a resistance from virtually anyone you meet in a near-future London in this open-world action-adventure.
gameplayHours: Main Story - 20 hours, Completionist - 60+ hours
about: Watch Dogs: Legion lets you recruit and play as any character in its open-world London.

faqs.question: Can you really play as any NPC?
faqs.answer: Yes, nearly every character can be recruited with unique perks and drawbacks.

faqs.question: Does it have multiplayer?
faqs.answer: Yes, including cooperative missions and PvP modes.

faqs.question: Can you play after finishing the story?
faqs.answer: Yes, with endless recruitment possibilities and side activities.
